parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> [[ArmA:_Mission_Editor#Synchronize_Mode_.28F5.29|Synchronizes]] the trigger with zero or more waypoints.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''synchronizeTrigger''' [waypoint1, waypoint2, ...]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] - trigger to synchronize
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [waypoint1, waypoint2, ...]: [[Array]] of waypoints to synchronize with trigger. Array can be empty to unset.
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> waypoint1: [[Waypoint]] - first waypoint
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> waypoint2: [[Waypoint]] - second waypoint

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_trigger synchronizeTrigger []</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_trigger synchronizeTrigger [_waypoint1]</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_trigger synchronizeTrigger [_waypoint1, [_group5, 7], _waypoint3]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createTrigger]], [[synchronizeWaypoint]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
